summary: Email chain from August 24, 2019 discussing notifications to victims in the Epstein case, including Florida victims and those covered by the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA). The correspondence involves coordination about an upcoming hearing and victim outreach efforts.

events.title: Victim Notification Coordination
events.description: Email exchange confirming extensive notifications to Epstein victims through various channels including the Victim Notification System (VNS), direct calls/emails to counsel, and website postings.

events.title: Upcoming Hearing Mentioned
events.description: Reference to a hearing scheduled for the following week, with inquiry about whether counsel for petitioners have been informed and given opportunity to speak.

keyFacts: Extensive victim notifications were made regarding Epstein case developments, including through VNS, direct calls/emails to counsel, and website updates.
Notifications went to every person identified as a victim in the case to date, including Florida victims and individuals covered by the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA).
The correspondence references coordination about an upcoming hearing and whether counsel for petitioners would have opportunity to speak.
